mapper.update: UPDATE SL_ACCOUNT SET DEL_FLG=#{delFlg}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER=VER+1 WHERE SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}

UPDATE SL_ACCOUNT AS A SET A.SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}, A.SL_TEL =#{slTel}, A.SL_CONTACT=#{slContact}, A.ACCOUNT_PSD=#{accountPsd}, A.SL_SHOW_NAME=#{slShowName}, A.AUTH_STATUS=#{authStatus}, A.FROM_FLG =#{fromFlg}, A.UPD_ID =#{updId}, A.UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, A.VER = A.VER + 1 WHERE A.SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}

UPDATE SL_SELLER SET SL_CODE =#{slCode}, SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}, SL_CODE_DIS=#{slCodeDis}, SL_CON_FLG =#{slConFlg},
AREA_CODE =#{areaCode}, LGCS_AREA_CODE=#{lgcsAreaCode}, PROVINCE_CODE=#{provinceCode}, CITY_CODE=#{cityCode}, DISTRICT_CODE=#{districtCode},
AREA_NAME =#{areaName}, LGCS_AREA_NAME =#{lgcsAreaName}, PROVINCE_NAME =#{provinceName}, CITY_NAME =#{cityName}, DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName},
EP_ID=#{epId}, SL_MAIN_CLASS=#{slMainClass}, SNK_FLG=#{snkFlg}, SELF_FLG=#{selfFlg}, AGENT_FLG =#{agentFlg}, OEM_FLG=#{oemFlg}, BUYER_FLG=#{buyerFlg}, SQA_STATUS =#{sqaStatus}, DIST_QUA=#{distQua}, SHOP_QUA=#{shopQua}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER=VER+1, MEMO1=#{memo1}, MEMO2=#{memo2}, MEMO3=#{memo3}, MEMO4=#{memo4}, MEMO5=#{memo5}, MEMO6=#{memo6}, MEMO7=#{memo7}, MEMO8=#{memo8}, MEMO9=#{memo9}, MEMO10=#{memo10}, MEMO11=#{memo11}, MEMO12=#{memo12}, MEMO13=#{memo13}, MEMO14=#{memo14}, MEMO15=#{memo15}, MEMO16=#{memo16}, MEMO17=#{memo17}, MEMO18=#{memo18}, MEMO19=#{memo19}, MEMO20=#{memo20} WHERE SL_CODE=#{slCode}
UPDATE SL_EP_CERT_ITEM SET CERT_ITEM_VALUE=#{certItemValue}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE EP_ID=#{epId} AND CERT_ID=#{certId} AND CERT_ITEM_ID=#{certItemId}

UPDATE SL_EP_BRAND SET BRAND_NAME=#{brandName}, BRAND_NO=#{brandNo}, BRAND_CLASS=#{brandClass}, BRAND_TERM_BEGIN=#{brandTermBegin}, BRAND_TERM_END=#{brandTermEnd}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER=VER+1 WHERE EP_ID=#{epId} AND BRAND_ID=#{brandId}

UPDATE SL_EP_CAP SET FTY_ASSET=#{ftyAsset}, FTY_REG_CAPITAL=#{ftyRegCapital}, FTY_LAND_AREA=#{ftyLandArea}, FTY_FLOOR_AREA=#{ftyFloorArea}, FTY_EQUIPMENT=#{ftyEquipment}, FTY_DESIGN_CAP=#{ftyDesignCap}, FTY_ACTUAL_CAP=#{ftyActualCap}, FTY_FT_RATE=#{ftyFtRate}, FTY_DS_RATE=#{ftyDsRate}, FTY_AS_RATE=#{ftyAsRate}, SCAP_MATERIAL=#{scapMaterial}, SCAP_PRODUCT=#{scapProduct}, LAB_AREA=#{labArea}, LAB_FUNCTION=#{labFunction}, LAB_INVESTMENT=#{labInvestment}, LAB_MEMBER=#{labMember}, DD_EQUIPMENT=#{ddEquipment}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER= VER+1 WHERE EP_ID=#{epId}

UPDATE SL_PD_BRAND SET BRAND_NAME = #{brandName}, BRAND_TYPE = #{brandType}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo}, TERM_BEGIN = #{termBegin}, TERM_END = #{termEnd}, BRAND_CLASS=#{brandClass}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode} AND BRAND_EP_ID=#{brandEpId} AND BRAND_ID = #{brandId}

UPDATE SL_EP_AGENT_AUTH SET CONTRACT_NO=#{contractNo}, AUTH_EP_NAME=#{authEpName}, AUTH_TERM_BEGIN=#{authTermBegin}, AUTH_TERM_END=#{authTermEnd}, AUTH_TERM_UNLIIMITED=#{authTermUnliimited}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER=VER+1 WHERE SL_CODE=#{slCode} AND PRODUCER_EP_ID=#{producerEpId}

UPDATE SL_EP_OEM_AUTH SET CONTRACT_NO=#{contractNo}, AUTH_EP_NAME=#{authEpName}, AUTH_TERM_BEGIN=#{authTermBegin}, AUTH_TERM_END=#{authTermEnd}, AUTH_TERM_UNLIIMITED=#{authTermUnliimited}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER=VER+1 WHERE SL_CODE=#{slCode} AND PRODUCER_EP_ID=#{producerEpId}
mapper.select: SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode, SL_MAIN_CLASS AS slMainClass FROM SL_SELLER WHERE SL_ACCOUNT=#{filterMap.slAccount} AND DEL_FLG = 0
SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode, SL_MAIN_CLASS AS slMainClass FROM SL_SELLER WHERE EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG = 0
SELECT A.SL_ACCOUNT AS slAccount from SL_ACCOUNT AS A WHERE A.SL_ACCOUNT = #{filterMap.slAccount}
SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode FROM SL_SELLER WHERE EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG = 0

SELECT MAX(a.sl_account) as slAccount FROM sl_account a INNER JOIN sl_seller s ON a.SL_ACCOUNT = s.sl_account AND a.DEL_FLG = s.DEL_FLG AND s.SL_MAIN_CLASS = '0' AND s.DEL_FLG = '0' WHERE a.DEL_FLG = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SL_PD_BRAND ( SL_CODE, BRAND_EP_ID, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, BRAND_TYPE, CONTRACT_NO, TERM_BEGIN, TERM_END, BRAND_CLASS, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, DEL_FLG, VER ) VALUES ( #{slCode}, #{brandEpId}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{brandType}, #{contractNo}, #{termBegin}, #{termEnd}, #{brandClass}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 0, 1 )

INSERT INTO SL_EP_AGENT_AUTH ( SL_CODE, PRODUCER_EP_ID, CONTRACT_NO, AUTH_EP_NAME, AUTH_TERM_BEGIN, AUTH_TERM_END, AUTH_TERM_UNLIIMITED, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{slCode}, #{producerEpId}, #{contractNo}, #{authEpName}, #{authTermBegin}, #{authTermEnd}, #{authTermUnliimited}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 1 )

INSERT INTO SL_EP_OEM_AUTH ( SL_CODE, PRODUCER_EP_ID, CONTRACT_NO, AUTH_EP_NAME, AUTH_TERM_BEGIN, AUTH_TERM_END, AUTH_TERM_UNLIIMITED, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{slCode}, #{producerEpId}, #{contractNo}, #{authEpName}, #{authTermBegin}, #{authTermEnd}, #{authTermUnliimited}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 1 )

INSERT INTO sl_ep_manager ( EP_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_DUTIES, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_EDUC, MEMBER_TEL, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{epId}, #{memberId}, #{memberDuties}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberEduc}, #{memberTel}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 1 )

INSERT INTO SL_EC_TEAM ( SL_CODE, MEMBER_ID, LEADER_FLG, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_EDUC, MEMBER_TEL, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{slCode}, #{memberId}, #{leaderFlg}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{birthday}, #{memberEduc}, #{memberTel}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE SL_EP_BRAND_HONOR SET HONOR_DES = #{honorDes}, HONOR_NO=#{honorNo}, CERT_DATE=#{certDate}, CERT_ISSUER=#{certIssuer}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER = VER +1 WHERE EP_ID=#{epId} AND BRAND_ID=#{brandId} AND HONOR_ID=#{honorId}

UPDATE SL_PD_BRAND SET BRAND_NAME =#{brandName}, BRAND_TYPE=#{brandType}, TERM_BEGIN=#{termBegin}, TERM_END=#{termEnd}, BRAND_CLASS=#{brandClass}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE SL_CODE=#{slCode} AND BRAND_ID=#{brandId} AND BRAND_EP_ID=#{brandEpId}
mapper.select: SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode FROM SL_SELLER WHERE EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE sl_seller SET EP_ID = #{epId}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE SL_CODE=#{slCode}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM SL_SELLER WHERE SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode} AND DEL_FLG = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sl_ep_dd ( EP_ID, DD_ID, DD_NAME, DD_EQUIPMENT, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{epId}, #{ddId}, #{ddName}, #{ddEquipment}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 1 )
mapper.select: select count(1) from sl_account where SL_TEL=#{filterMap.slTel} AND DEL_FLG = 0
